message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique qualities and craftsmanship. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1,200,000. To make this acquisition possible for you, I am offering the product at a strategic price that I believe will be beneficial for both parties. My proposal is to extend the opportunity to purchase this product for $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for us. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can finalize this transaction. Kind regards, Alice
